mapper.select: select api.id as `key` from t_api_info api where not exists (select * from t_app_api u where u.api_id = api.id and u.app_id = #{appId} and u.is_deleted = '0') and api.server_id = #{serverId} and api.is_deleted = '0'
select api.server_id,api.api_status,api.api_uri,api.id as `key`,api.api_name as `label`,api.id from t_api_info api where api.server_id = #{serverId} and api.is_deleted = '0'

select api.server_id,api.api_status,api.api_uri,api.id as `key`,api.api_name as `label` from t_api_info api left join t_app_api aa on aa.api_id = api.id where aa.app_id = #{appId} and api.is_deleted = '0' and aa.is_deleted = '0'
select app.open_id,aa.api_id from t_app_api aa left join t_app_info app on app.id = aa.app_id where aa.is_deleted = '0' and app.is_deleted = '0'

select s.host_path, s.deploy_type, api.proxy_path, api.proxy_path as path, api.api_name, api.api_uri, api.api_status, api.server_id, api.id from t_api_info api left join t_server_info s on s.id = api.server_id where exists (select * from t_app_api u where u.api_id = api.id and u.is_deleted = '0') and api.is_deleted = '0'

SELECT app.`app_name` FROM `t_app_info` app LEFT JOIN `t_app_api` aa ON aa.`app_id` = app.`id` LEFT JOIN t_api_info api ON api.`id` = aa.`api_id` WHERE api.id = ${apiId} and app.is_deleted = '0' and aa.is_deleted = '0' and api.is_deleted = '0' ORDER BY app.id LIMIT 1

SELECT count(id) FROM `t_api_info` a WHERE a.`proxy_path` = #{proxyPath} and a.is_deleted = '0'
AND a.`id` != ${id}
